caption.p:
The viral tissue load of PRV HB1201 by qPCR. (A) Viral tissue load of the pig groups immunized with Bartha-K61, Bartha-gC
HB
1201, or Bartha-gD
HB
1201. (B) Viral tissue load of the groups immunized with Bartha-K61, Bartha-gCD
HB
1201 or DMEM after HB1201 challenge. Asterisk indicates a significant difference: * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001.
